org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizerfactory

Class JapaneseTokenizerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.text.tokenization.tokenizerfactory.JapaneseTokenizerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenizerFactory

    public class JapaneseTokenizerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenizerFactory
    Tokenizer Factory for Japanese based on Kuromoji.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JapaneseTokenizerFactory()
      Creates a factory that uses the defaults for Kuromoji.
      JapaneseTokenizerFactory(boolean useBaseForm)
      Creates a factory that uses the Kuomoji defaults but returns normalized/stemmed "baseForm" tokens.
      JapaneseTokenizerFactory(Tokenizer.Builder builder)
      Create a factory using the supplied Kuromoji configuration.
      JapaneseTokenizerFactory(Tokenizer.Builder builder, boolean baseForm)
      Create a factory using the supplied Kuromoji configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tokenizer create(java.io.InputStream toTokenize)
      InputStreams are currently unsupported.
      Tokenizer create(java.lang.String toTokenize)
      Create a Tokenizer instance for the given sentence.
      TokenPreProcess getTokenPreProcessor()
      Returns TokenPreProcessor set for this TokenizerFactory instance
      void setTokenPreProcessor(TokenPreProcess preProcessor)

    • Constructor Detail

      • JapaneseTokenizerFactory

        public JapaneseTokenizerFactory()
        Creates a factory that uses the defaults for Kuromoji.

      • JapaneseTokenizerFactory

        public JapaneseTokenizerFactory(boolean useBaseForm)
        Creates a factory that uses the Kuomoji defaults but returns normalized/stemmed "baseForm" tokens.
        Parameters:
        useBaseForm - normalize conjugations "走った" -> "走る" instead of "走っ"

      • JapaneseTokenizerFactory

        public JapaneseTokenizerFactory(Tokenizer.Builder builder)
        Create a factory using the supplied Kuromoji configuration. Use this for setting custom dictionaries or modes.
        Parameters:
        builder - The Kuromoji Tokenizer builder with your configuration in place.

      • JapaneseTokenizerFactory

        public JapaneseTokenizerFactory(Tokenizer.Builder builder,
                                boolean baseForm)
        Create a factory using the supplied Kuromoji configuration. Use this for setting custom dictionaries or modes.
        Parameters:
        builder - The Kuromoji Tokenizer builder with your configuration in place.
        baseForm - normalize conjugations "走った" -> "走る" instead of "走っ"
